item.title: By: David Leedy
item.dc:creator: David Leedy
item.description: <p>Congratulations Matt! 8 years is quite an achievement.</p>
item.content:encoded: Congratulations Matt! 8 years is quite an achievement.

item.title: By: Paul Mooney
item.dc:creator: Paul Mooney
item.description: <p>That makes you officially old.</p><p>Well done. Even I find interesting stuff on this site form time to time sir!</p>
item.content:encoded:
That makes you officially old.

Well done. Even I find interesting stuff on this site form time to time sir!

item.title: By: Ben Poole
item.dc:creator: Ben Poole
item.description: <p>Congratulations! Time flies when you're having fun eh?</p>
item.content:encoded: Congratulations! Time flies when you’re having fun eh?

item.title: By: Tim Clark
item.dc:creator: Tim Clark
item.description: <p>Happy Birthday Old Timer!<br/>Keep going it's good stuff, and you're right about the community.</p>
item.content:encoded:
Happy Birthday Old Timer!
Keep going it’s good stuff, and you’re right about the community.

item.title: By: Stuart McIntyre
item.dc:creator: Stuart McIntyre
item.description: <p>Congratulations Matt. A great effort over the years.</p>
item.content:encoded: Congratulations Matt. A great effort over the years.

item.title: By: Richard Shergold
item.dc:creator: Richard Shergold
item.description: <p>Happy Birthday - I remember quite well reading your early blogs.</p>
item.content:encoded: Happy Birthday – I remember quite well reading your early blogs.
